Cannot reproduce in I20040514 (8AM). I get the red error message (in the 
status area) saying "Breakpoint cannot be set at the given position" - no 
error in the log.

Enable folding, fold the class add a breakpoint in the vertical ruler below the
folded class.
Still get the same error message, no error in the log.

you are using I200405131600 - are you?

steps.

1. open DebugCoreMessages in CU Editor
2. enable folding by pressin Ctrl+Numpad_divid
3. collapse the class (left to "public"
4. double-click at the bottom of the vertical ruler
I am using I20040514-0800. Will try an older build.

We are asking the doc for its number of lines and lets say it returns 16.
Then we check were you have double click and it is at line 12...but you are 
code folded so when you attempt to get the line information for line 12 you 
get the bad location exception? I would think that when the document is folded

BadLocationException if we ask for information on the folded lines?
